Do \w not|strong="H3588"\w* hesitate \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w take|strong="H3423"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land!
